Project File Structure¶

  • agents/: Agent modules (Chat, Plan, Task, etc.)

  • scripts/: Bash scripts and helper functions

  • doc/: Knowledge base JSON

  • output/: Execution results

  • data/: Input datasets

  • examples/: Example runs

Citation¶

If you use BioMaster in your work, please cite:

@article{su2025biomaster,
  title={BioMaster: Multi-agent System for Automated Bioinformatics Analysis Workflow},
